page.title: 19GAMES
page.content: We asked 100 children between 7 and 11 years about the games that they played. The most popular game was 'Kerbs'; two people stand on the opposite sides of the road. You throw a ball at the kerb.If it hits and bounces back you score a point. The first one to get 5 points is the winner. Another popular game was 'T.V.Programmes'; About 5 people play this game. One boy tells the others the day and time a programme is on. If someone guesses it right it is his turn to pick a programme for the others to guess. Other games were 'Kick the Tin', Football,' Escape', 'Hidey' and 'British Bulldog'.
